channel.title: Need help changing things
channel.description:
hey i need help like chaning the title of cleint. i just switched from 317s to 508s, 508s look little harder but to change the client name on 317s its just client.java but 508 dont have it
my server is 508 tidalscaoe bye clockworks27
help please

item.title: Need help changing things
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

To change the batch file name

right click of run, click edit then change the name under title save and you done.

Changing the client frame name

go in frame_sub1 and search for something like this
setTitle(“Your Client Name”);
its a small file so it should be easy

Read full topic
